alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 12 at 1:09AM PDT until April 13 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern portions of Inyo County including Death Valley National Park. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds may result in blowing dust and loose objects being blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways impacted include US 395 and Highway 190.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
